definitions.definition: An astringent salt , usually occurring in the form of pale crystals , much used in the dyeing and tanning trade and in certain medicines , and now understood to be a double sulphate of potassium and aluminium (K 2 SO 4 ·Al 2 (SO 4 ) 3 ·24H 2 O). [from 14th c.]
( inorganic chemistry ) Any similar double sulphate in which either or both of the potassium and aluminium is wholly or partly replaced by other univalent or tervalent cations . [from 17th c.]

main_definition: An astringent salt , usually occurring in the form of pale crystals , much used in the dyeing and tanning trade and in certain medicines , and now understood to be a double sulphate of potassium and aluminium (K 2 SO 4 ·Al 2 (SO 4 ) 3 ·24H 2 O). [from 14th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( inorganic chemistry ) Any similar double sulphate in which either or both of the potassium and aluminium is wholly or partly replaced by other univalent or tervalent cations . [from 17th c.]

definitions.definition: A past attendee or graduate (of any gender) of a college, university or other educational institution.

main_definition: ( Canada , US ) A past attendee or graduate (of any gender) of a college, university or other educational institution.
